name: REUNITE (void1gaming)
description:
When the quads were abducted by Tris a hero stepped to save them all. This is the journey of him through the lairs of the evil Tris to rescue his fellow quads and get them to safety.

Run around through the traps and mazes set by the Tris, get past them to reach and save your friends from the foes.

Integrated with  great story line and adventure, Download it now !
